description:
Carry all your day's needs for commuting or weekend touring, and help reduce waste in our waterways. Spacious compartments have room for groceries, camping gear and all your workout gear. Easy on-off hardware and waterproof fabric are dependable coming or going.

  • Oceanweave® fabric made with reclaimed fishnets
  • Water-resistant stitching and a polyurethane coating keep contents dry
  • Internal backboard keeps the pannier's shape
  • Rixen & Kaul® attachment system fits rails 6 to 16mm
  • Daisy-chain loops provide options for additional tie-downs
  • Reflective accents and light loops on both sides
name: Axiom Seymour Oceanweave P55+ Panniers
